SEARCH
Package network

Interface NetworkManagerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkManager, NetworkManager
public interface NetworkManagerInterface
Interface for the network manager object that handles all communication with the server

      Disconnect from the server

    • reconnect

      void reconnect() throws Exception
      Reconnect to the server
      Throws:
      Exception - if the client wasn't connected to the server before

    • isConnected

      boolean isConnected()
      Check if the client is connected to the server
      Returns:
      true if the client is connected to the server

    • getEvent

      Optional<ServerEvent> getEvent()
      Get first event in the event queue if there is one
      Returns:
      the first event in the event queue if there is one or empty if there is none

    • hasEvent

      boolean hasEvent()
      Check if there is an event in the event queue
      Returns:
      true if there is an event in the event queue or false if there is none

    • lobbyList

      Function<Boolean,ArrayList<Lobby>> lobbyList() throws Exception
      Get a list of all the lobbies on the server
      Returns:
      the remote function handler for this call
      Throws:
      Exception - if the network manager is not connected to the server

    • login

      Function<Login,Serializable> login(Login username) throws Exception
      Login to the server
      Parameters:
      username - the username to log in with
      Returns:
      True if successful and no game is running or GameInfo if successful and there is a game running
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is any kind of problem during the login process

    • join

      void join() throws Exception
      Join all inner threads and close all connections
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is any kind of problem during the join process
